response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to you at $1,200,000. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features and benefits, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, providing you with a significant saving while allowing us to maximize the value of our product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
